summary:
This mod adds two new NPC to the west of Whiterun: Gwen and Artorius
SKYRIM V1.8 IS REQUIRED
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/wn46ymsxn/2012_12_23_00004.jpg[/img]
[/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod adds two new NPC to the west of Whiterun: Gwen and Artorius
SKYRIM V1.8 IS REQUIRED

* DESCRIPTION *
IMO the wild tundra in the west side of Whiterun lacks of something, so I added an house and two NPCs. Gwen and Artorius are married and they live their own life.

[img]http://s7.postimage.org/wkkbbspa3/2012_12_23_00001.jpg[/img]

* GWEN *
Gwen is a female Nord and she is an expert of archery. She wakes up at 6am and does breakfast. During the morning she stays in home and may sell you everything about bows and arrows. It also depends on your level. High is your level and she sells you precious bows for you.
In the afternoon she stays at home until 6pm then she goes to hunting around the home (radius: 10000). She goes back at 8pm for dinner and goes to sleep at 9pm.
[img]http://s13.postimage.org/6jxorv4uv/2012_12_23_00007.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/tv3ov3ahh/2012_12_23_00011.jpg[/img]

* ARTORIUS *
Artorius is a male Nord and he is an expert of archery too, he is a Master trainer (100). At the same time of Gwen, Artorius wake up at 6am and does breakfast.
During the morning he stays outside the home and works at the tanning rack and/or chop wood. In the noon he goes to the Drunken Huntsman at Whiterun. In the evening he goes back to home for dinner and sleep at 9pm (or more).
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/itphkfw1n/2012_12_23_00012.jpg[/img]

* THE HOME *
The home is a light and FX experiment. Every light source and FX in the house depends on sunlight including windows light and candles light.
[img]http://s13.postimage.org/t8rh56bmf/2012_12_23_00005.jpg[/img]

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find bugs. Thank you

* FACEBOOK *
Join my page: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

* ENJOY *
author: MannyGT
